Subject: Client system not reflecting on Server
Description:
1. One system in Client environment is not reflecting on console.

2. We have tried re-installing still it doesn't appear.

3. un-installed and then rebooted and installed again, still not reflecting.

Kindly check and update us or you could take client remote session and check
What_We_Know__c:
a prospect 'BD Software Distribution Pvt Ltd'
is having trouble with one Windows endpoint system that is unable to establish a connection to the EPP Server. The prospect have deployed 7 endpoints but the 8th Windows endpoint is not able to make a connection to the EPP Server and get registered.
The epp endpoints are sending TCP traffic over port 446, the customer is re-routing this traffic over port 443 to reach the EPP Server.

I had a remote session with the customer and we uninstalled the existing EPP client with logs and database removed, rebooted the system and then reinstalled the EPP Client.
We collected logs from two computers, one that is working fine and the other that is not making contact with the EPP Server.
Next_Steps__c: Logs submitted to R&D for further analysis
Solution_Comment__c:
Hello Muhammad,

Since we have not heard back from you in a while, we are assuming your issue has been resolved and are closing this support ticket.   Please reach out to us right away if you believe this ticket should remain open or if we can provide additional assistance.
After a ticket has been closed it can be reopened within 30 days after closure in case there are any updates from your side.    If no update is received within 30 days after closure then a new ticket will need to be opened where you can use the previous ticket number as a reference.
